item.title: Medal of Honor: Above and Beyond
item.dc:creator: rokhopper
item.description: Medal of Honor: Above and Beyond is a first-person shooter video game for virtual reality helmets developed by Respawn Entertainment and released on December 11, 2020.
item.content:encoded: Medal of Honor: Above and Beyond is a first-person shooter video game for virtual reality helmets developed by Respawn Entertainment and released on December 11, 2020.

item.title: Crysis 2
item.dc:creator: rokhopper
item.description: Crysis 2 is a sci-fi first-person shooter video game developed by the German company Crytek and published by Electronic Arts. The game was released on March 22, 2011 in North America, March 24, 2011 in Europe and March 25, 2011 in Australia for PC, Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3 platforms.
item.content:encoded: Crysis 2 is a sci-fi first-person shooter video game developed by the German company Crytek and published by Electronic Arts. The game was released on March 22, 2011 in North America, March 24, 2011 in Europe and March 25, 2011 in Australia for PC, Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3 platforms.

item.title: Star Wars Jedi: Survivor
item.dc:creator: rokhopper
item.description: Star Wars Jedi: Survivor is an action-adventure video game developed by Respawn Entertainment and published by Electronic Arts. It is a direct sequel to Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order released in 2019. The game was released on April 28, 2023 for Windows, PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X/S.
item.content:encoded: Star Wars Jedi: Survivor is an action-adventure video game developed by Respawn Entertainment and published by Electronic Arts. It is a direct sequel to Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order released in 2019. The game was released on April 28, 2023 for Windows, PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X/S.
